bookDescription: Social media data has given visualization a new rise in importance for companies the world over, but there’s far more to visualization than social media. When it comes to analysing and visualizing network graphs you need a platform that offers a great selection of tool, and Gephi is that platform. Learn everything you need to know about Gephi and how to use it effectively with your data, and see how to go from creating simple graphs to customizing and deploying custom visualizations that stand out among the crowd!
bookTitle: Network Graph Analysis and Visualization with Gephi

bookDescription: RavenDB is a document database written in .NET, offering a flexible data model that you can get up-and-running in a few minutes. Discover the basics of RavenDB that you can bring to any version with this free beginner ebook! You’ll look at how to quickly build high performance, NoSQL document-oriented .NET applications using the .NET client API all the way from the basics to deployment!
